      • addReview

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="/recipe/{recipeId}/{ownerId}")
public void addReview(@PathVariable
                                                                                                           java.lang.Integer recipeId,
                                                                                                           @PathVariable
                                                                                                           java.lang.Integer ownerId,
                                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                                           Review review)
        Creates a new review for a recipe
        Parameters:
        recipeId - the ID of the recipe the review is for
        ownerId - the ID of the person creating the review
        review - the review object to be created (rating, title, description)

                                                                                            Review newReview)
